summary: A princess is on a quest to unite the five greatest warriors to save her kingdom from a demon sorceress.
cast: Inbar Lavi|Sasha Mitchell|Kevin Sorbo|Michael Paré|Matthew Willig|Ralf Moeller|Lee Horsley|Melissa Ordway|Whitney Able|Jennifer Siebel Newsom|Olivier Gruner|Scott Paulin|Norbert Weisser|Morgan Weisser|Sarah Ann Schultz|Janelle Marra|Xavier Declie|Victoria Maurette|Leena Kurishingal|Cazzy Golomb|Shannon Garnett|Stephanie Katz|Trudi Forristal|Eva Card|Michael Bayouth|Keith Bass|Carol Shook|Mathew Cape|Lauren Sutherland|Allexa D'Alessio|Dallas Ryan|Franco Carlotto|Jessica Delgado|Zackary Morad|Mahta Sharif|Nicholas Middlekauff|Anna Van Sambeck|Mariela Navarro|Eddie Davenport|Slim Khezri
title: Tales of an Ancient Empire
